title: Red Currant Sauce (Johannisbeersauce)
instructions: Place all the ingredients into a whisking bowl and whisk everything together until it’s smooth and creamy.
Cover and chill until ready to use.
Remarks:  Serve as a dipping sauce for a fondue; as a sauce with roast beef, roast venison, or roast pork.
Source:  The New German Cookbook by Jean Anderson and Hedy Würz published by Harper Collins Publishers, © 1993 by Jean Anderson and Hedy Würz.
